wikipedia_page.main:
Simon Baker is an aviator and the Chief Flying Instructor at Freedom Sports Aviation (Long Marston, Warwickshire).  He has three times been Microlight World Champion (1996, 1999 & 2003) and six times British Champion.He has also taken part in several microlighting expeditions, including filming a Channel 4 documentary over Iceland in 1983, flying in the Himalayas near Everest in 1986, and was a pilot/spotter for the ThrustSSC team in Jordan
 and in Black Rock Desert, Nevada.

response: * Freedom Sports Aviation - club and flying school; Chief Flying Instructor Simon Baker)
Simon Baker (born 1969) is an Australian actor.
Simon Baker may also refer to:
* Simon Baker (Canadian actor) (born 1986), Aboriginal Canadian actor
